entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
